REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2477 reute d f BC-KEY-CENTURION-<KEYC> 04-03 0060

TEXT.TITLE: KEY CENTURION <KEYC> TO BUY BANK OF BUCKHANNON
TEXT.BODY: Key Centurion Bancshares Inc said it reached an agreement in principle to acquire Central National Bank of Buckhannon, in W. Virginia. Terms call for an exchange of 2.75 shares of Centurion shares for each share of Central National. The transaction is valued at 16.2 mln dlrs. Reuter
